## AuthContainer.requestEmailVerification() method

Requests user email verification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestEmailVerification(email: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  email | <code>string</code> | Registered email address of the user |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
